rukus.text: 37|22|(aadesh hoga ki) gher lao sab atyaachaariyon ko tatha unake saathiyon ko aur jisakee ve ibaadat (vandana) kar rahe the.
37|23|allaah ke siva. phir dikha do unhen narak kee raah.
37|24|aur unhen rok[1] lo. unase prashn kiya jaaye.
37|25|kya ho gaya hai tumhen ki ek-doosare kee sahaayata nahin karate
37|26|balki ve us din, sir jhukaaye khade honge.
37|27|aur ek-doosare ke sammukh hokar paraspar prashn karengeh
37|28|kahenge ki tum hamaare paas aaya karate the daayen[1] se.
37|29|ve[1] kahengeh balki tum svayan eemaan vaale na the.
37|30|tatha nahin tha hamaara tumapar koee adhikaar,[1] balki tum savany avagyaakaaree the.
37|31|to sidhd ho gaya hamapar hamaare paalanahaar ka kathan ki ham (yaatana) chakhane vaale hain.
37|32|to hamane tumhen kupath kar diya. ham to svayan kupath the.
37|33|phir ve sabhee, us din yaatana mein saajhee honge.
37|34|ham, isee prakaar, kiya karate hain aparaadhiyon ke saath.
37|35|ye vo hain ki jab kaha jaata tha unase ki koee poojy (vandaneey) nahin allaah ke atirikt, to ve abhimaan karate the.
37|36|tatha kah rahe theh kya ham tyaag dene vaale hain apane poojyon ko, ek unmat kavi ke kaaran
37|37|balki vah (nabee) sach laaye hain tatha pushti kee hai, sab rasoolon kee.
37|38|nishchay tum duhkhadaayee yaatana chakhane vaale ho.
37|39|tatha tum usaka pratikaar (badala) diye jaoge, jo tum kar rahe the.
37|40|parantu allaah ke shudhd bhakt.
37|41|yahee hain, jinake lie vidit jeevika hai.
37|42|pratyek prakaar ke phal tatha yahee aadaraneey honge.
37|43|sukh ke svargon mein.
37|44|aasanon par ek-doosare ke sammukh aseen honge.
37|45|phiraaye jaayenge inapar pyaale, pravaahit pey ke.
37|46|shvet aasvaat peene vaalon ke lie.
37|47|nahin hogee usamen shaaririk peeda, na ve usamen bahakenge.
37|48|tatha unake paas aankhe jhukaaye, (sati) badee aankhon vaalee (naariyaan) hongee.
37|49|vah chhupaaye hue andon ke maanind hongee.
37|50|vah ek-doosare se sammukh hokar prashn karenge.
37|51|to kahega ek kahane vaala unamen seh mera ek saathee tha.
37|52|jo kahata tha ki kya tum (pralay ka) vishvaas karane vaalon mein se ho
37|53|kya jab ham, mar jaayenge tatha mittee aur asthiyaan ho jaayenge, to kya hamen (karmon) ka pratiphal diya jaayega
37|54|vah kahegaah kya tum jhaankakar dekhane vaale ho
37|55|phir jhaankate hee use dekh lega, narak ke beech.
37|56|usase kahegaah allaah kee shapath! tum to mera vinaash kar dene ke sameep the.
37|57|aur yadi mere paalanahaar ka anugrah na hota, to main (narak ke) upasthiton mein hota.
37|58|phir vah kahegaah kya (ye sahee nahin hai ki) ham marane vaale nahin hain
37|59|sivaay apanee pratham maut ke aur na hamen yaatana dee jaayegee.
37|60|vaastav mein, yahee badee saphalata hai.
37|61|isee (jaisee saphalata) ke lie chaahiye ki karm karen, karm karane vaale.
37|62|kya ye aatithy uttam hai athava thohad ka vrksh
37|63|hamane use atyaachaariyon ke lie ek pareeksha banaaya hai.
37|64|vah ek vrksh hai, jo narak kee jad (tah) se nikalata hai.
37|65|usake guchchhe shaitaanon ke siron ke samaan hain.
37|66|to ve (narak vaasee) khaane vaale hain, usase. phir bharane vaale hain, usase apane pet.
37|67|phir unake lie usake oopar se khaulata garam paanee hai.
37|68|phir unhen pratyaagat hona hai, narak kee or.
37|69|vaastav mein, unhonne paaya apane poorvajon ko kupath.
37|70|phir ve unheen ke padchinhon par[1] daude chale ja rahe hain.
37|71|aur kupath ho chuke hain, inase poorv agale logon mein se adhiktar.
37|72|tatha ham bhej chuke hain unamen, sachet (saavadhaan) karane vaale.
37|73|to dekho ki kaisa raha saavadhaan kiye hue logon ka parinaam
37|74|hamaare shudhd bhakton ke siva.
